summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of Meridian Avenue from North 77th Street to North 85th Street; and North 78th Street, from East Green Lake Boulevard to Meridian Avenue, all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same and providing for the necessary surface drainage, all in accordance with Resolution No. 2832 of the city council of the City of Seattle; and providing payment therefor by the mode of "Payment in Bonds", as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle.
